message.content: {"id": "6009", "title": "New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes", "description": "", "OB": "When using the new class wizard with a .java file open in the editor and selecting the option 'Enclosing Type', the field is blank.", "EB": "The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the currently selected type in the editor.", "SR": "Ensure that the 'Enclosing Type' field in the new class wizard defaults to the type that is currently open in the editor."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '6009', 'title': "Bug 6009New class wizard doesn't get context right for nested classes", 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Build 20011106. with a .java file open in the editor, click the new class button check "Enclosing Type" the field is blank it should default to the current type in the editor ', 'SR': ''}
